metadata.title: Roses Are Red Pizza Sauce Is Too I Got A Large Not For You T-Shirt
features: Solid colors: 100% Cotton; Heather Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; All Other Heathers: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester

A must have for any pizza lover. This funny pizza theme is a perfect gift for any pizza lover or someone who likes to play jokes on others. funny for anyone who likes Pizza, or other types of Junk Food. Any kid or adult that's a kid at heart.

Look for related designs by searching our brand: Funny Ironic Sarcastics. This is the perfect to wear to school, work, sports events or practices to show your love for pizza. Great gift for Birthdays, Christmas, Fathers Day, Mothers Day.
Lightweight, Classic fit, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem
